about_the_game:
Welcome one and all to the exciting world of Rigo: The Movie. Experience a small taste of imagination, in this short demo of the game. See the many artstyles and listen to so many different composers.

Do I have much more to say...?

Not really, It's a demo, and it should speak for itself.

So please enjoy this new comedy and consider supporting us on Kickstarter while it is live this month of April 2019!

Adieu.

name: Rigo: The Movie Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Join Rigo and his "friends" as they engage in everyday activities in a not so normal world. With his unique brand of stupidity, guide Rigo's choices so that you can discover every single route in the game (or just rush to the end to say that you finished, that's fine too).
